wikipedia_page.main: Ash Gardiner, (born 11 December 1998), known professionally as Gabz, is an English singer who reached the final of the seventh series of Britain's Got Talent in 2013. Gabz released his debut single "Lighters (The One)" on 30 June 2013, which peaked at number six on the UK Singles Chart.

response: * Gabz Gardiner, finalist in series 7 of Britain's Got Talent
